name: National Rugby Manager
description: With the best match engine ever seen in a rugby manager, combined with the best rugby teams and players in the French Leagues at your fingertips, National Rugby Manager gives you the chance to lead your team to glory and conquer French rugby.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Intel Core 1.8Ghz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compliant DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
